name: Feather (itch) (Xentie)
description:
This is my publication for the Brackey's Game Jam ! I'm really happy do publish this cuz it's my really first game :). Now you are probably wandering: "The the me was Light, but I just have a feather that can go up and down".  I did not created about light, I created a game about being light !

Have fun ! :D
